name: Cursivity
description:
Take control of your Cube and help it reach every checkpoints. 
Solve various and challenging puzzles using your programming skills.
Can you manage to finish them all ?

Features :

  • Free and No Ads
  • Over 20 programming puzzles
  • Easy to jump in for beginners
  • Unlock new mechanics as you progress
  • Use various programming concepts
  • 3D stylized graphics
  • Fully customizable player
  • In-game Level editor
  • Community levels
  • More than 20 achievements to unlock
  • Score Leaderboard
    •    

Programming Concepts :

  • Instructions and Commands
  • Conditions
  • Functions
  • Recursive Functions
  • Debugging
  • Optimization
